skills.title: React
skills.description: I'm skilled in React, bringing dynamic and responsive web applications to life with my expertise and passion.

skills.title: TypeScript
skills.description: I'm well-versed in TypeScript, leveraging its strong typing and enhanced developer experience to build robust and scalable web applications.

skills.title: JavaScript
skills.description: JavaScript is my playground, where I create interactive and functional web solutions that captivate and engage users.

skills.title: HTML && CSS
skills.description: My proficiency in HTML and CSS allows me to sculpt visually stunning and structurally sound web pages, turning design into reality.

portfolio.title: Invenstment Calculator
portfolio.description: This is the investment calculator project that empowers users to make informed financial decisions by projecting returns and helping plan for their future.

portfolio.title: React Meals
portfolio.description: Excited to share my React meals project, where I'm cooking up a delightful and interactive experience for food enthusiasts. From browsing recipes to meal planning, it's a flavorful journey in the world of React.

portfolio.title: React Events
portfolio.description: I've recently completed a React Events project, where I've successfully built a platform for users to create, discover, and attend events that match their interests. It's all about bringing people together for unforgettable experiences!
